revised_title: Ancient Irish Temple and Stone-Hatchet: A Letter from the Right Reverend Father in God Robert Lord Bishop of Corke
tldr: The author, Robert Lord Bishop of Corke, shares his findings on an ancient Irish temple similar to Stonehenge and a stone-hatchet from the same era. He describes the temple's structure, its possible significance, and the custom of using stones as markers for burial sites and places of worship.
